name: tm47
effect: Teaches Steel Wing to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Low Sweep to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Steel Wing Gen I: Explosion)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
